findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function does not have any protection mechanism to prevent unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is unprotected and allows a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account without proper authorization.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The mint function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized users to create new tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The burn function does not have any protection or access control, allowing anyone to call it and potentially drain the contract's tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The swap function does not have proper protection against unauthorized access or malicious activities.

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: The skim function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of sensitive data.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The sync function does not have any protection mechanism, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The initialize function is unprotected, allowing anyone to call it and potentially alter the contract's state.

findings.title: Unprotected permit function
findings.description: The permit function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function lacks protection, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of allowances.

findings.title: Unprotected deliver function
findings.description: The 'deliver' function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromReward function
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected includeInReward function
findings.description: The includeInReward function is declared as external and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized modifications.

findings.title: Unprotected setTaxFeePercent function
findings.description: The setTaxFeePercent function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes to the tax fee percentage.

findings.title: Unprotected setLiquidityFeePercent function
findings.description: The setLiquidityFeePercent function is unprotected and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected setMaxTxPercent function
findings.description: The setMaxTxPercent function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker to drain the contract's liquidity.

findings.title: Unprotected setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled function
findings.description: The setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes to the contract's state.
